@model PalletManagementSystem.Web2.ViewModels.Pallets.SearchResultsViewModel
@{
    ViewBag.Title = "Search Results - " + Model.Keyword;
}

<!-- Main Content -->
<div class="container-fluid mt-4">
    <!-- Breadcrumb -->
    <nav aria-label="breadcrumb" class="mb-4">
        <ol class="breadcrumb">
            <li class="breadcrumb-item"><a href="@Url.Action("Index", "Home")"><i class="fas fa-home"></i> Home</a></li>
            <li class="breadcrumb-item active" aria-current="page">Search Results</li>
        </ol>
    </nav>

    <!-- Search Header -->
    <div class="search-header mb-4">
        <div class="row align-items-center">
            <div class="col-md-8">
                <h4><i class="fas fa-search mr-2"></i>Search Results for "@Model.Keyword"</h4>
                <p class="text-muted mb-0">Found @Model.TotalResults results</p>
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-4">
                <div class="search-container">
                    <form action="@Url.Action("Results", "Search")" method="get" class="form-inline justify-content-md-end">
                        <div class="input-group">
                            <input type="text" name="keyword" class="form-control" placeholder="Search..." value="@Model.Keyword">
                            <div class="input-group-append">
                                <button class="btn btn-outline-secondary" type="submit">
                                    <i class="fas fa-search"></i>
                                </button>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    @if (Model.TotalResults == 0)
    {
        <div class="alert alert-info">
            <i class="fas fa-info-circle mr-2"></i>No results found for "@Model.Keyword". Please try a different search term.
        </div>
    }
    else
    {
        <!-- Pallets -->
        if (Model.PalletResults.Any())
        {
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <i class="fas fa-pallet mr-2"></i>Pallets (@Model.PalletResults.Count)
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                        <table class="table table-hover">
                            <thead>
                                <tr>
                                    <th>Pallet Number</th>
                                    <th>Manufacturing Order</th>
                                    <th>Division</th>
                                    <th>Platform</th>
                                    <th>Status</th>
                                    <th>Created Date</th>
                                    <th>Actions</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody>
                                @foreach (var pallet in Model.PalletResults)
                                {
                                    <tr>
                                        <td>@pallet.PalletNumber</td>
                                        <td>@pallet.ManufacturingOrder</td>
                                        <td>@pallet.Division</td>
                                        <td>@pallet.Platform</td>
                                        <td>
                                            @if (pallet.IsClosed)
                                            {
                                                <span class="badge badge-success">Closed</span>
                                            }
                                            else
                                            {
                                                <span class="badge badge-orange">Open</span>
                                            }
                                        </td>
                                        <td>@pallet.CreatedDate.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy")</td>
                                        <td>
                                            <a href="@Url.Action("Details", "Pallets", new { id = pallet.Id })" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                                <i class="fas fa-eye"></i>
                                            </a>
                                        </td>
                                    </tr>
                                }
                            </tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        }

        <!-- Items -->
        if (Model.ItemResults.Any())
        {
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <i class="fas fa-box mr-2"></i>Items (@Model.ItemResults.Count)
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <div class="table-responsive">
                        <table class="table table-hover">
                            <thead>
                                <tr>
                                    <th>Item Number</th>
                                    <th>Client</th>
                                    <th>Reference</th>
                                    <th>Manufacturing Order</th>
                                    <th>Pallet</th>
                                    <th>Created Date</th>
                                    <th>Actions</th>
                                </tr>
                            </thead>
                            <tbody>
                                @foreach (var item in Model.ItemResults)
                                {
                                    <tr>
                                        <td>@item.ItemNumber</td>
                                        <td>@item.ClientName</td>
                                        <td>@item.Reference</td>
                                        <td>@item.ManufacturingOrder</td>
                                        <td>
                                            <a href="@Url.Action("Details", "Pallets", new { id = item.PalletId })">
                                                @item.PalletNumber
                                            </a>
                                        </td>
                                        <td>@item.CreatedDate.ToString("MM/dd/yyyy")</td>
                                        <td>
                                            <a href="@Url.Action("Details", "Items", new { id = item.Id })" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                                <i class="fas fa-eye"></i>
                                            </a>
                                        </td>
                                    </tr>
                                }
                            </tbody>
                        </table>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        }

        <!-- Manufacturing Orders -->
        if (Model.ManufacturingOrderResults.Any())
        {
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <i class="fas fa-file-alt mr-2"></i>Manufacturing Orders (@Model.ManufacturingOrderResults.Count)
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <div class="row">
                        @foreach (var order in Model.ManufacturingOrderResults)
                        {
                            <div class="col-md-4 mb-3">
                                <div class="card">
                                    <div class="card-body">
                                        <h5 class="card-title">@order</h5>
                                        <a href="@Url.Action("Index", "Pallets", new { ManufacturingOrder = order })" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                            <i class="fas fa-search mr-1"></i>View Pallets
                                        </a>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        }
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        }

        <!-- Clients -->
        if (Model.ClientResults.Any())
        {
            <div class="card mb-4">
                <div class="card-header">
                    <i class="fas fa-building mr-2"></i>Clients (@Model.ClientResults.Count)
                </div>
                <div class="card-body">
                    <div class="row">
                        @foreach (var client in Model.ClientResults)
                        {
                            <div class="col-md-4 mb-3">
                                <div class="card">
                                    <div class="card-body">
                                        <h5 class="card-title">@client.ClientName</h5>
                                        <p class="card-text text-muted">Client Code: @client.ClientCode</p>
                                        <p class="card-text">Items: @client.ItemCount</p>
                                        <a href="@Url.Action("Index", "Items", new { ClientCode = client.ClientCode })" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-primary">
                                            <i class="fas fa-search mr-1"></i>View Items
                                        </a>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        }
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        }
    }
</div>

@section styles {
    <style>
        .search-header {
            background-color: #e6eef5;
            border-radius: 8px;
            padding: 20px;
        }

            .search-header h4 {
                color: #003366;
                margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            }

        .badge-orange {
            background-color: #f57c00;
            color: white;
        }
    </style>
}

===============================================================================
File: Views\Settings\Index.cshtml
===============================================================================
@model PalletManagementSystem.Web2.ViewModels.Settings.UserPreferencesViewModel
@{
    ViewBag.Title = "Settings";
}

<!-- Main Content -->
<div class="container-fluid mt-4">
    <!-- Breadcrumb -->
    <nav aria-label="breadcrumb" class="mb-4">
        <ol class="breadcrumb">
            <li class="breadcrumb-item"><a href="@Url.Action("Index", "Home")"><i class="fas fa-home"></i> Home</a></li>
            <li class="breadcrumb-item active" aria-current="page">Settings</li>
        </ol>
    </nav>

    <!-- Success, error and warning messages -->
    @if (TempData["SuccessMessage"] != null)
    {
        <div class="alert alert-success alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
            <i class="fas fa-check-circle mr-2"></i>@TempData["SuccessMessage"]
            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close">
                <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
            </button>
        </div>
    }

    @if (TempData["ErrorMessage"] != null)
    {
        <div class="alert alert-danger alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
            <i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle mr-2"></i>@TempData["ErrorMessage"]
            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close">
                <span aria-hidden="true">&times;</span>
            </button>
        </div>
    }

    @if (TempData["WarningMessage"] != null)
    {
        <div class="alert alert-warning alert-dismissible fade show" role="alert">
            <i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle mr-2"></i>@TempData["WarningMessage"]
            <button type="button" class="close" data-dismiss="alert" aria-label="Close">

            </button>
        </div>
    }

    <!-- Settings Header -->

    </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>

</div>

@section scripts {
    <script>
        // Handle division change to update platforms
        document.getElementById('divisionSelect').addEventListener('change', function() {
            var divisionValue = this.value;
            var platformSelect = document.getElementById('platformSelect');

            // Call server to get updated platform options
            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
            xhr.open('POST', '@Url.Action("GetPlatformsForDivision", "Settings")', true);
            xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded');
            xhr.onreadystatechange = function() {
                if (xhr.readyState === 4 && xhr.status === 200) {
                    try {
                        var response = JSON.parse(xhr.responseText);
                        if (response.success) {
                            // Clear existing options
                            while (platformSelect.firstChild) {
                                platformSelect.removeChild(platformSelect.firstChild);
                            }

                            // Add new options
                            for (var i = 0; i < response.platforms.length; i++) {
                                var option = document.createElement('option');
                                option.value = response.platforms[i].value;
                                option.text = response.platforms[i].text;
                                platformSelect.appendChild(option);
                            }
                        } else {
                            alert('Error: ' + response.message);
                        }
                    } catch (e) {
                        alert('Error parsing response');
                    }
                }
            };
            xhr.send('division=' + encodeURIComponent(divisionValue));
        });

        // Handle touch mode checkbox
        document.getElementById('TouchModeEnabled').addEventListener('change', function() {
            var touchModeSettings = document.querySelector('.touch-mode-settings');
            if (this.checked) {
                touchModeSettings.classList.remove('d-none');
            } else {
                touchModeSettings.classList.add('d-none');
            }
        });

        // Handle auto refresh checkbox
        document.getElementById('AutoRefreshPalletList').addEventListener('change', function() {
            var refreshIntervalSettings = document.querySelector('.refresh-interval-settings');
            if (this.checked) {
                refreshIntervalSettings.classList.remove('d-none');
            } else {
                refreshIntervalSettings.classList.add('d-none');
            }
        });
    </script>
}

@section styles {
    <style>
        .form-label {
            font-weight: 500;
            color: #003366;
        }

        .custom-control-label {
            font-weight: normal;
        }

        .card {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .list-group-item i {
            width: 20px;
            text-align: center;
        }
    </style>
}

===============================================================================
File: Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml
===============================================================================
@{
    // Get the current user context
    var username = ViewBag.Username ?? "John Doe";
    var division = ViewBag.Division ?? "MA";
    var platform = ViewBag.Platform ?? "TEC1";
}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=11" />
    <title>@ViewBag.Title - Pallet Management System</title>

    @Styles.Render("~/Content/css")
    @Scripts.Render("~/bundles/modernizr")

    <!--[if IE]>
    @Scripts.Render("~/bundles/ie11compat")
    <![endif]-->
</head>
<body>
    <nav class="navbar navbar-expand-lg navbar-dark">
        <div class="container-fluid">
            <a class="navbar-brand" href="@Url.Action("Index", "Home")">
                <i class="fas fa-cubes mr-2"></i>Pallet Management System
            </a>
            <button class="navbar-toggler" type="button" data-toggle="collapse" data-target="#navbarNav">
                <span class="navbar-toggler-icon"></span>
            </button>
            <div class="collapse navbar-collapse" id="navbarNav">
                <ul class="navbar-nav mr-auto">
                    <li class="nav-item @(ViewContext.RouteData.Values["Controller"].ToString() == "Pallets" ? "active" : "")">
                        <a class="nav-link" href="@Url.Action("Index", "Pallets")">
                            <i class="fas fa-pallet mr-1"></i>Pallets
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li class="nav-item @(ViewContext.RouteData.Values["Controller"].ToString() == "Items" ? "active" : "")">
                        <a class="nav-link" href="@Url.Action("Index", "Items")">
                            <i class="fas fa-box mr-1"></i>Items
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <li class="nav-item @(ViewContext.RouteData.Values["Controller"].ToString() == "Settings" ? "active" : "")">
                        <a class="nav-link" href="@Url.Action("Index", "Settings")">
                            <i class="fas fa-cog mr-1"></i>Settings
                        </a>
                    </li>
                </ul>

                <div class="d-flex align-items-center">
                    <div class="dropdown mr-3">
                        <button class="btn btn-light dropdown-toggle" type="button" id="divisionDropdown" data-toggle="dropdown">
                            <i class="fas fa-building mr-1"></i>Division: @division
                        </button>

                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="dropdown mr-3">
                        <button class="btn btn-light dropdown-toggle" type="button" id="platformDropdown" data-toggle="dropdown">
                            <i class="fas fa-layer-group mr-1"></i>Platform: @platform
                        </button>
                        <div class="dropdown-menu">
                            @if (division == "MA")
                            {
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC1" })">TEC1</a>
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC2" })">TEC2</a>
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC4I" })">TEC4I</a>
                            }
                            else
                            {
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC1" })">TEC1</a>
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC3" })">TEC3</a>
                                <a class="dropdown-item" href="@Url.Action("SetPlatform", "Settings", new { platform = "TEC5" })">TEC5</a>
                            }
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="text-light">
                        <i class="fas fa-user mr-1"></i>@username
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </nav>

    <div class="container-fluid mt-4">
        @RenderBody()
    </div>

    <footer class="footer mt-auto py-3 bg-light">
        <div class="container-fluid text-center">
            <span class="text-muted">
                &copy; @DateTime.Now.Year Manufacturing Company - Pallet Management System v2.5.1
            </span>
        </div>
    </footer>

    @Scripts.Render("~/bundles/jquery")
    @Scripts.Render("~/bundles/bootstrap")
    @Scripts.Render("~/bundles/pms")
    @RenderSection("scripts", required: false)
